product_name: Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Quarter Cube
long_description: Organize and compress your clothing and gear with the Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Quarter Cube, so you can get the most out of every square inch of your travel bag. Made of washable, odor-resistant polyester with a mesh top so you can see what's inside. Compresses either folded or rolled socks, underwear and more; can also hold your electronics cords and accessories. 2-way zippered opening makes it easy to open and close when fully packed. Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Quarter Cube measures 7.5 in. x 4.5 in. x 2.5 in. Pack-It Cubes are also available in other sizes.
short_description: Organize and compress your clothing and gear with the Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Quarter Cube, so you can get the most out of every square inch of your travel bag.
